query: We're planning a week-long trip starting from Indianapolis to Texas for two individuals. The journey will cover 3 cities in Texas and will span from March 11th to March 17th, 2022. The total budget for the trip is $6,900. Our lodging preferences should allow pets, and we're especially fond of Chinese, French, Mexican, and Mediterranean cuisines. Please note that we prefer not to drive ourselves during this trip.
actions: choose_city_bundle:[Austin,El Paso,Dallas]
